resources.string: Igama lakho lisetshenziselwa ukwenza ithebhulethi yakho namasevisi we-Google abe awakho siqu.
Le thebhulethi isebenzisa igama lakho ukwenza ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza kube ezakho siqu.
Ithebulethi yakho ixhumana ne-Google ukulondoloza ulwazi kwi-akhawunti yakho. Lokhu kungathatha amaminithi angu-5.

"Ithebhulethi yakho ixhumana ne-Google ukubona ukuthi igama lomsebenzisi olifisayo liyatholakala yini.
Lokhu kungathatha amaminithi ambalwa.."
"Iqoqa ulwazi mayelana nethebhulethi yakho. Lokhu kungathatha amasekhondi angama-30."

"Sebenzisa i-akhawunti yakho ye-Google ukulondoloza izinhlelo zokusebenza zakho, izilungiselelo (okufana namabhukumaki, namaphasiwedi we-Wi-Fi), nenye idatha. Uma ulondoloze ngaphambilini i-akhawunti yakho, ungayibuyisela kule thebhulethi manje.
Ungashintsha izilungiselelo zakho zokulondoloza noma kunini Ezilungiselelweni."

"Sebenzisa i-akhawunti yakho ye-Google ukulondoloza izinhlelo zokusebenza zakho, izilungiselelo (ezifana namabhukumaki, namaphasiwedi e-Wi-Fi), nenye idatha.
Ungashintsha izilungiselelo zakho zokulondoloza noma kunini Ezilungiselelweni."
Ithebulethi yakho ithinta i-Google ukuze ungene kwi-akhawunti yakho. Lokhu kungathatha amaminithi angu-5.
Letha izinhlelo zokusebenza, izilungiselelo, nenye idatha kule thebulethi oyenze isipele ngaphambilini kwi-akhawunti yakho ye-Google.
